General.Name: KC Co. Ltd
General.Description: KC Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes semiconductor systems, display systems, and electronic materials in South Korea and internationally. It offers semiconductor equipment, including chemical mechanical polishing equipment and wet cleaning systems; display equipment, such as wet station systems, atmospheric pressure plasma cleaners, CO2 cleaners, and coater and track systems that are used in LCD, LTPS, OLED, and flexible display panels; and dielectric slurries and additives, and metal slurries. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Anseong, South Korea
